turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Telerama.
turn.2: Telerama  " For the French magazine, see Télérama " Telerama was an Internet service provider and technology company based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
turn.4: It was founded in 1991 and promoted itself as the third ISP in world history.
turn.5: What are some of its achievements?
turn.6: Telerama launched its Wi-Fi network in Pittsburgh in 2001, comprising over 200 nodes.
turn.7: What made it a pioneer in the industry?
turn.8: It concentrated access mainly in "coffee-house" style arrangements.
turn.9: What else is significant about it?
turn.10: In 2003, Telerama's Wi-Fi network started appearing at sites in the Cultural District, Pittsburgh.
turn.12: In 2004 it started lighting up large buildings in downtown Pittsburgh.
